column5: Private cabin with great lake location close to Lush resort, ymca camp, local restaurants and grocery. Location is on the east side of the lake between Hells Gate and the dam. Small boat dock that you can tie your boat to. No boat lift. Great view, with patio and gas grill. Full kitchen but no dishwasher. Master bedroom does not have private doors, only curtains. One small bathroom with full size shower. Great for small family or friend get togethers.
